SOMA Array Base Class

Source: R/SOMAArrayBase.R
SOMAArrayBase.Rd

Adds SOMA-specific functionality to the TileDBArray class. (lifecycle: experimental)

Super classes

tiledbsoma::TileDBObject -> tiledbsoma::TileDBArray -> SOMAArrayBase

Active bindings

soma_type

Retrieve the SOMA object type.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

SOMAArrayBase$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
